## Brief information on the classes chosen 

```{r include=FALSE}
library(MASS)
library(caret)
library(class)
data(crabs)
```

```{r}
params$size_spl
params$k
```



```{r}
crabs$sp <- as.numeric(crabs$sp) - 1
crabs$sex <- as.numeric(crabs$sex) - 1
        
spl = createDataPartition(crabs$sp, p = params$size_spl, list = FALSE)
        
XTrain = crabs[spl,-3]
XTest = crabs[-spl,-3]
knn_pred <- knn(train = scale(XTrain[,-1]), test = scale(XTest[,-1]), cl = XTrain$sp, k=params$k)
levels(knn_pred) <- c("B","0")
XTest <- as.factor(XTest$sp)
levels(XTest) <- c("B","0")
confusionMatrix(knn_pred, XTest)
```
